cover.title: Visual Basic How To Program
cover.body: The Edmonton Oilers are an Edmonton-based professional ice hockey team. They are a member of the Pacific Division of the Western Conference in the National Hockey League (NHL) and play their home games at Rogers Place, which opened in 2016, The Oilers hired Jay Woodcroft as their head coach on February 11, 2022, and Ken Holland as their general manager on May 7, 2019. The Edmonton Oilers are one of two NHL teams situated in Alberta, the other being the Calgary Flames; their near proximity has resulted in a bitter rivalry known as the "Battle of Alberta."
